content:
I'm wondering if I can use an experimental API within lint codes. Context :point_down:
I took a quick look at this issue and thought something like split_inclusive(char::is_uppercase) is well suited, where split_inclusive is a nightly-only fn.

Clippy already uses many nightly features, so one more should not do any harm. Just add it to lib.rs if it simplifies fixing the issue. Note that experimental features are ok, incomplete features is something we want to avoid though.
